info.author: Baohua Yang
info.description:
EasyOVS provides more convenient and fluent way to operation your OpenvSwitch bridges,
        such as list them, show the port, dump their flows and add/del some flows.
        See https://github.com/yeasy/easyOVS
info.name: easyovs
info.summary: Smart tool to manage Neutron rules in OpenStack enviroment
info.html_description:
EasyOVS provides more convenient and fluent way to operation your OpenvSwitch bridges,
such as list them, show the port, dump their flows and add/del some flows. See https://github.com/yeasy/easyOVS
